attributes.action: Have the UK become part of the Republic Of Ireland to avoid a hard Brexit.
attributes.background: There is an impasse over the British border in Ireland and the backstop arrangements to avoid a hard border. This would be avoided by having the UK become a part of The Republic Of Ireland. No border would be needed. And the UK would benefit economically and politically.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the people of the UK and Ireland, not the UK Parliament and Government. 

You could start a new petition about something the UK Parliament and Government are responsible for.
